forum.content:
The Lions series will certainly have an impact on this year’s Premiership but I do not see it being a negative one, even for those clubs who will be missing players for the first few games, either through injury or the need for an extended rest. On the contrary, I think it could have a massively positive effect on the rugby.

You simply cannot underestimate the impact of a tour like that in terms of changing players’ and coaches’ ways of thinking; working at that intensity for that length of time; rubbing shoulders with other world-class players and coaches; the exposure to new ideas, new styles, new tactics.
